block.farmersdelight.stove.tip: Allows you to use a Cooking Pot or Skillet.
block.farmersdelight.cooking_pot.tip: Used for making a variety of foods with unique effects. Most foods cooked in this will require a bowl or other container to serve them on.
block.farmersdelight.basket.tip: A Basket can be used to store items like a chest.
block.farmersdelight.cutting_board.tip: Can be used to cut items placed on it using a Knife or other tool.
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tip: Will cook food held in your offhand when used near a Stove. Can also be placed on top of a Stove.
block.farmersdelight.rope.tip: Crafted from Straw. Can be climbed like a ladder.
block.farmersdelight.safety_net.tip: Causes players and mobs to bounce when they jump on it.
block.farmersdelight.tatami.tip: Crafted from Canvas and Straw. Can be used as decoration.
block.farmersdelight.organic_compost.tip: Turns into rich soil over time when placed. Composts faster with water, sun exposure and mushrooms.
block.farmersdelight.rich_soil.tip: A nutrient-rich form of dirt formed from organic compost. Can be tilled with a hoe.
Grows crops more efficiently than farmland. Cannot be trampled.
block.farmersdelight.carrot_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Carrots.
block.farmersdelight.potato_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Potatoes.
block.farmersdelight.beetroot_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Beetroots.
block.farmersdelight.cabbage_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Cabbages.
block.farmersdelight.tomato_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Tomatoes.
block.farmersdelight.onion_crate.tip: A compact way of storing Onions.
block.farmersdelight.rice_bale.tip: A compact way of storing Rice Panicles.
block.farmersdelight.rice_bag.tip: A compact way of storing Rice.
block.farmersdelight.straw_bale.tip: A compact way of storing Straw.
block.farmersdelight.brown_mushroom_colo: A colony of multiple Brown Mushrooms. Only grows on Rich Soil.
block.farmersdelight.red_mushroom_colony: A colony of multiple Red Mushrooms. Only grows on Rich Soil.
block.farmersdelight.wild_cabbages.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in beach coasts.
block.farmersdelight.wild_tomatoes.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in arid lands, such as savannas and deserts.
block.farmersdelight.wild_onions.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in temperate lands, such as plains and forests.
block.farmersdelight.wild_carrots.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in temperate lands, such as plains and forests.
block.farmersdelight.wild_potatoes.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in cold lands, such as mountains and taigas.
block.farmersdelight.wild_beetroots.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in beach coasts.
block.farmersdelight.wild_rice.tip: Commonly found as a wild plant in the ponds of wet lands, such as swamps and jungles.
item.farmersdelight.tomato.tip: Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can also be cooked into a variety of foods.
item.farmersdelight.cabbage.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can also be cooked into a variety of foods.
item.farmersdelight.onion.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be planted in farmland.
item.farmersdelight.rice.tip: Can be planted to grow rice. Must be placed in 1-block shallow water in order to grow properly.
item.farmersdelight.cabbage_seeds.tip: Can be planted to grow cabbages.
item.farmersdelight.tomato_seeds.tip: Can be planted to grow tomatoes.
item.farmersdelight.rice_panicle.tip: Can be crafted to create rice.
item.farmersdelight.straw.tip: Obtained by cutting grassy crops and plants with a Knife. Used in crafting.
item.farmersdelight.canvas.tip: Crafted from Straw. Can be used to craft decorative blocks such as Canvas Signs.
item.farmersdelight.tree_bark.tip: Obtained from cutting any log with an axe on a Cutting Board. Can be used to craft Organic Compost.
item.farmersdelight.tomato_sauce.tip: Restores w §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used in cooking more advanced foods.
item.farmersdelight.hot_cocoa.tip: Removes a single harmful status effect.
item.farmersdelight.melon_juice.tip: Provides a small amount of instant health.
item.farmersdelight.wheat_dough.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r, but can cause you to be poisoned. Can be baked in a furnace to make Bread.
item.farmersdelight.raw_pasta.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r, but can cause you to be poisoned. Used to cook a variety of foods.
item.farmersdelight.cabbage_leaf.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Cabbage.
item.farmersdelight.minced_beef.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 1 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Beef.
item.farmersdelight.chicken_cuts.tip: Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten, but can cause you to be poisoned. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Chicken.
item.farmersdelight.bacon.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 1 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Porkchop.
item.farmersdelight.cod_slice.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Cod.
item.farmersdelight.salmon_slice.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Salmon.
item.farmersdelight.mutton_chops.tip: Can be consumed quickly. Restores 0.5 §f🍖§r when eaten. Can be used as an alternative to Raw Mutton.
item.farmersdelight.ham.tip: Restores 2.5 §f🍖§r, or can be cooked in a smoker.
item.farmersdelight.smoked_ham.tip: Restores 5 §f🍖§r. Created by cooking ham in a smoker.
item.farmersdelight.pie_crust.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r. Used to create various pies.
item.farmersdelight.cake_slice.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r. Obtained by breaking a full Cake with a knife.
item.farmersdelight.apple_pie_slice.tip: Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Obtained by breaking a full Apple Pie with a knife.
item.farmersdelight.sweet_berry_cheeseca: Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Obtained by breaking a full Sweet Berry Cheesecake with a knife.
Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Obtained by breaking a full Chocolate Pie with a knife.
item.farmersdelight.fruit_salad.tip: Restores 3 §f🍖§r. Provides regeneration for a short time.
item.farmersdelight.sweet_berry_cookie.t: Restores 1 §f🍖§r. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.farmersdelight.honey_cookie.tip: Restores 1 §f🍖§r. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.farmersdelight.melon_popsicle.tip: Restores 1.5 §f🍖§r. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.farmersdelight.glow_berry_custard.t: Restores 3.5 §f🍖§r. Will make you glow when eaten.
item.farmersdelight.kelp_roll_slice.tip: Restores 3 §f🍖§r. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.farmersdelight.mixed_salad.tip: Restores 3 §f🍖§r and provides Regeneration for a short time.
item.farmersdelight.nether_salad.tip: Restores 2.5 §f🍖§r. Eating this can cause you to become nauseous.
block.farmersdelight.roast_chicken_block: Requires a Bowl to eat. Contains 4 portions of Roast Chicken.
block.farmersdelight.stuffed_pumpkin_blo: Requires a Bowl to eat. Contains 4 portions of Stuffed Pumpkin.
block.farmersdelight.honey_glazed_ham_bl: Requires a Bowl to eat. Contains 4 portions of Honey Glazed Ham.
block.farmersdelight.shepherds_pie_block: Requires a Bowl to eat. Contains 4 portions of Shepherd's Pie.
block.farmersdelight.rice_roll_medley_bl: Contains 3 Kelp Roll Slices, 3 Salmon Rolls and 2 Cod Rolls.
item.farmersdelight.dog_food.tip: Restores 2 §f🍖§r. Can be fed to a tamed Wolf to temporarily increase its speed, strength and resistance.
item.farmersdelight.horse_feed.tip: Can be fed to a Horse to temporarily increase its speed and jump height.
block.farmersdelight.cabinets.tip: A Cabinet can be used to store items like a chest.
item.farmersdelight.knife.tip: A lightweight melee weapon. Can harvest Straw from grasses and guarantee secondary drops from animals.
item.frontiers.truffle_pasta.tip: Restores 8 §f🍖§r and provides Nourishment for a good amount of time.
item.frontiers.fried_golden_egg.tip: Restores 2.5 §f🍖§r and provides Allurement for a short time.
